sentence.Network_en: Hiding under all the nonsense about nescience is one - fairly obvious - truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是关于所谓“新态”的所有废话的背后,倒也藏着个相当明显的实话.

sentence.Network_en: Complete with crenellations, ramparts and parapets , the stronghold of nescience reigns supreme.
sentence.Network_cn: 开垛口 、 城墙 、 胸墙具备的无知的要塞极度盛行.

sentence.Network_en: He then provides a four - step guide to managing nescience.
sentence.Network_cn: 他还提出了一个管理“新态”的四步法.
